title: Chapter 2615: The Nobles And Generals Fall Into High Halls (3)
body:
Chapter 2615: The Nobles And Generals Fall Into High Halls (3)

Chapter 2615: The Nobles and Generals Fall into High Halls (3)

Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

The voice sounded again, filled with shock and disbelief.

“Your body is trembling! Your soul is trembling! Your emotions are boiling! Your blood is raging!”

“Everything about you shows that you are very excited!”

“But you’re just hunched over and your head is lowered. You even have so many scruples when you call out? So many burdens?”

“Who do you think you are? Are you more important than Master Siren and Elder Dao the Flamboyant?”

Cao Erzhu was furious when he heard this. Was this thing trying to mock him?

He straightened up, raised his head, and thrust out his chest. He let his violent primitive emotions push his body forward and took a firm step forward.

“Ah!”

He swung his right hand and hammered the air.

At the same time, he crushed the big rocks under his feet to show his masculinity.

“Are you f*cking kidding me?”

Jin Ren almost came apart when he saw this.

He caught a glimpse of something from the blue-purple electric current on the big guy’s body.

However, he had never expected that the intelligence report about ‘having an intellectual problem’ was actually true!

“Are you such a loser? You don’t even dare to vent your emotions?”

“When you’re excited, scream. If you’re unhappy, hit out. It’s so simple. Don’t you understand even the basics?”

“Are you under some weapon prohibition order or controlled by someone? How could Kui Leihan have fathered such a loser like you?”

“I’m not a loser!” Cao Erzhu was furious.

He suddenly realized that the voice was not from the demon in his mind, but came from the surroundings.

The words ‘weapon prohibition order’ reminded him that the person who spoke to him was not a fake. It was someone who knew about the existence of the iron command token on his father’s neck!

Cao Erzhu looked around and found the only spiritual senses that was present was stored in a pile of scrap metal.

“Who are you?” He asked angrily. “Why did you call me a loser? I’m not a loser!”;

“Very good!” The voice that came from the pile of scrap metal was even louder than his. “It’s this aura. Look, does anyone care about you?”

Cao Erzhu was stunned by the shout and looked around.

His voice was already very loud and made the snow fall. However, no one paid any attention to him.

He looked up and saw that the battle in the Nine Heavens was still ongoing.

The old immortal Mei’s dual swords in the sword image couldn’t break the barrier, but he didn’t stop there.

He raised his hands and drew a faint line on the Taicheng Sword with his fingertips.

“Nine Swords Techniques, Infinite Number!”

The sword image seemed to have gone crazy. The Nine Swords illusion around its body transformed into countless swords. Each sword slashed down fiercely and hit a point on the barrier membrane as it hacked away desperately.

“Clang, clang…”

“Boom boom…”

The explosions in the Nine Heavens did not stop.

Circles of air currents exploded, and the dazzling and gorgeous halos were like fireworks that could only be seen in Jade Capital City.

All of these were more direct than venting one’s emotions, and it made people feel more satisfied.

“No one is looking at me, I am not important…”

Cao Erzhu’s heart surged, but he was also somewhat disappointed.

He was not destined to be the main character in those novels. Even his loud shouts did not attract any attention.

The voice from the pile of scrap metal sounded again, filled with a strong sense of regret.

“You still say that you’re not a loser?”

“You only know how to gather your aura and roar at a remnant thought like me. If this isn’t bullying the weak and fearing the strong, what is?”

“I’m not…” Cao Erzhu waved his hands repeatedly and retreated. How could he be a person who bullied the weak and feared the strong?

He did not know that there was a remnant will of a true person in this pile of scrap metal. He was just a little emotional and had no intention of humiliating it.

“If you aren’t, then why did you come up the mountain? Are you here to watch a show?”

“I did it because…”

“Is it important? I’m asking you if it’s important!” The person in the pile of scrap metal seemed to be even more irritable than the old immortal Mei’s sword image.

“Since you were brought here by Master Siren, then you are not with the Elder Dao the Flamboyant!”

“Since you’re not here to watch the show, you don’t even dare to shout or cheer when Master Siren is fighting up there!”

“If you’re not a loser, then who is?”

“I’m not a loser!!!” Cao Erzhu bent and roared. Purple lightning surged around his body, and the sound waves sent the pile of scrap metal in front of him flying.

“My business is very important! It is very important! It’s extremely important!”

“I want revenge!”

Revenge?

What revenge?

Within the remains of the Divine Puppet, Jin Ren was momentarily stunned. In the blink of an eye, he roared even louder.

“You’re taking revenge on me. What kind of ability is that? Do I have a grudge with you?”

“If you have the guts, go and f*cking roar at Dao Qiongcang. Do you dare to vent your anger on him?!”

Cao Erzhu’s aura was suppressed as he glanced at the sky. “But they are still fighting…”

“Is their business more important, or is your business more important?”

“They’re fighting, and you want to wait? What kind of bullshit logic is that!”

The voice from the pile of scrap metal was furious. “If I were you, I would have shouted out long ago. Who cares if he’s fine or not!”

“I don’t know how to shout…” Cao Erzhu weakly raised his finger.

This sentence and the subsequent action, suddenly made Jin Ren lose his temper.

Little chap.

I can only say this.

“I’ll teach you! F*ck!”

“Mei Siren, do you really want to join the Saint Servant?”

The battle continued in the sky. Dao Qiongcang was shocked by the old sword saint’s undulating attack.

He felt that the Thirty Three Heavens Star Weaving array might not be able to withstand the damage caused by Mei Siren.

“I did not cripple Xu Xiaoshou. What you see of the remains of the Divine Puppet is merely himself…”
